bibl.title: The Roman Withdrawal from Nubia: A New Interpretation. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The milestone C.I.L. III, 141483 proves that the Roman military presence in the Dodecaschoenus was still, at least, partially intact in the mid-290's A.D.
bibl.seg: BURSTEIN Stanley M., The Roman Withdrawal from Nubia: A New Interpretation. Avec résumé en anglais.
The milestone C.I.L. III, 141483 proves that the Roman military presence in the Dodecaschoenus was still, at least, partially intact in the mid-290's A.D.
